channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: The last of 8 escaped bulls from a Massachusetts rodeo is caught on highway
item.description: A lone bull on the lam that was one of eight that escaped from a rodeo in a Massachusetts mall parking lot has been caught.

item.title: Harris is more popular than Trump among AAPI voters, a new APIA Vote/AAPI Data survey finds
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris is viewed more favorably by Asian American, Native Hawaiian and Pacific Islander voters than former President Donald Trump.

item.title: Several states are making late changes to election rules, even as voting is set to begin
item.description: Across the U.S., including in some of the nation’s presidential swing states, new or recently altered state laws are changing how Americans will vote, tally ballots and administer and certify November’s election.
